thread.title: Excellent hotel, friendly staff and great location
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel, friendly staff and great location - Review of Archer Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: aDoodle123
title: Excellent hotel, friendly staff and great location
text:
Excellent hotel, staff were friendly and helpful, the room was small (as they often are in NYC) but very comfortable bed, great view of the empire state building and plenty of space (you can store luggage under the bed). Lovely bathroom and loved the 'turn down treats'! Great location, there are cafes close by but you can easily walk to Rockerfeller Centre, Grand Central Station, the Empire State Building, Times Square etc. etc. We walked to Central Park as well. Close to 5th Avenue for shopping. Would highly recommend. The roof top bar is worth a visit for the views.
Room Tip: It was worth paying for the view of Empire State but there is a rooftop bar which has lovely views i... See more room tips
